Carmel.Indianapolis Metropolitan Airport:
Indianapolis Metropolitan Airport (ICAO: KUMP, FAA LID: UMP) is a public airport 2 miles (3.2 km) southwest of Fishers, in Hamilton County, Indiana. It is 8 miles (13 km) northeast of downtown Indianapolis, is owned by the Indianapolis Airport Authority and is a reliever airport for Indianapolis International Airport.
Most U.S. airports use the same three-letter location identifier for the FAA and IATA, but Indianapolis Metropolitan Airport is UMP to the FAA and has no IATA code.
